abstract: A Belgian choreographer finds similarities in Beyonce's dance moves and costumes.
snippet: A Belgian choreographer finds similarities in Beyonce's dance moves and costumes.
lead_paragraph: Several of the dance moves in the new music video by Beyoncé for her song "Countdown" bear a striking resemblance to the work of the Belgian choreographer Anne Teresa De Keersmaeker, who told a radio station in Antwerp on Monday she believed Beyoncé had stolen her ideas.

headline.main: Beyoncé Accused of Plagiarism Over Video
